name: The Wallet Online Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who gives George the Cuban cigars?
questions.explanation:
Susan.

	George tells Susan that he and Jerry think they aren't getting enough money for the sitcom although they're getting a pretty standard deal.  Susan gave George the cigars from her father.

questions.text: Where does Jerry say his watch is?
questions.explanation:
The repair shop.

	Jerry's parents ask where the watch is in the car and Jerry says it's getting fixed.  Actually, Jerry threw out the watch in the previous episode, "The Ticket," and Uncle Leo found it in the garbage.

questions.text: Who says that they'll pay for Jerry's watch?
questions.explanation:
His father.

	Jerry tells his parents and Kramer that the watch was taken to a jeweler's in town and Kramer says that he'll get the watch back quickly because he knows the guy, but Jerry doesn't actually have a watch there.

questions.text: What is the name of Jerry's father?
questions.explanation:
Morty & Morty Seinfeld.

	In this episode, Morty has to go to a back specialist because he hurt his back on the pull-out sofa first seen in the season three episode "The Pen".  In that episode, Elaine also severely hurt her back when she slept on the sofa because there was a large bar across it.

questions.text: Who has a concussion in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Two episodes before this one, Kramer was kicked in the head by Crazy Joe Davola, and because of the story arc, Kramer is still feeling the effects.  Now Kramer is beginning to be his normal absurd self.

Velcro.

	This is revealed when Morty is in the waiting room at the doctor's office.  He says that he doesn't like the tearing sound, and in all of the years when he sold raincoats, he refused to use it.

questions.text: Who does George give the cigars to?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Before giving the cigars to Kramer, George smoked one and got nauseous.  Kramer smokes cigars in more than one episode in the series.

questions.text: Who does Elaine disguise herself as when she goes to Jerry's apartment?
questions.explanation:
A Federal Express worker.

	In the past four episodes, Elaine has been on a vacation in Europe.  We are shown scenes of her with her boyfriend in Paris and in Rome.  When she returns we find out that things aren't going well between them.

questions.text: How does Kramer set fire to his hair?
questions.correct: He lights his cigar over the stove
options: He uses a match near his hair
questions.explanation:
He lights his cigar over the stove.

	The smoke in his hair is produced by a small device in his hair, and in an outtake on the DVD, it even falls out.  This episode is in the third volume of DVDs.

questions.text: What gets stolen from Jerry's father at the doctor's office?
questions.explanation:
His wallet.

	His father refuses the doctor's services after his wallet is stolen while he's getting is x-rays.  The mystery behind the wallet is ended in the last episode of season four.
